summary: EVENFLO MODEL #4292098 P1  BLUE/WHITE CHECKERED PATTERN MATERIAL. THIS PARTICULAR COVER DOESN'T MAINTAIN ANY ELESTIC HOLD ON THE SEAT. THEREFORE, I HAVE RECEIVED SEVERAL COMPLAINTS FROM THOSE WHO WERE GIVEN THIS SEAT ABOUT THE COVER KEEPS COMING OFF AND LEANING OVER TOP THE CHILD. THEY SAID SEVERAL THINGS WERE ATTEMPTED TO REMEDY THE PROBLEM SUCH AS TRYING TO USE VELCRO OR STITCH THE LINING OR EVEN SAFETY PINS
